This is a good idea and would be very simple to implement. It would allow uncontaminated gear to remain clean while also separating used PPE from other healthcare workers going in to perform their duties.

description: Currently it appears that the care takers of those infected with the ebola virus put on their gear and remove their gear in the same location.  I think that it would be better if they put on clean gear in one location and removed the contaminated gear in a separate location and then showered before going back to their lives. I feel that if people are walking unprotected into an area, that it should be reserved for dressing up only.
